publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

history.provenance: found in Qizil Miŋ-Öyduring T III MQ 54.1

seg.seg: Deshalb soll der Weise alle Lieben aufgeben, nur dich nicht!
Therefore, the wise shall give up all loves, but not you.
... If the [right] time comes, then I will look for the fruit of it.
If the [right] time comes, then I will look for the fruit of it.
... I will praise you with all [my] love; give me a resounding result, as it were!
I will praise you with all [my] love; give me a resounding result, as it were!

p.note: On IDP, recto and verso are reversed.

list.item: b3 ... If the [right] time comes, then I will look for the fruit of it. b6 ... I will praise you with all [my] love; give me a resounding result, as it were!

On IDP, recto and verso are reversed.
